summary: Send your enemies flying away with the sheer power of Evidence!
descriptionHtml:
Feel like an Ace Attorney, when your "Fus-Ro-Dah!" shout is replaced by the all famous "Objection!" from the greatest defence attorney, Phoenix Wright.

WARNING: This will replace the "Fus-Ro-Dah" sound file, make a backup copy of the normal .Fuz files if you wish to return to "Fus-Ro-Dah" after installing the "Objection" file

Note: If the mod activation with NMM fails, simply put the files manually into Data/Sounds/Voice/Skyrim.esm/Maleeventoned.

If people like this mod, i may create some for Women characters, like with Mia or Franchezca
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1EM4SQkyHBM&feature=youtube_gdata
author: Fidu21
